title: Yuki To Sumi
alternative_title: 雪と墨 ; Snow & Ink ; Snow and Ink
status: 雪と墨 ; Snow & Ink ; Snow and Ink
description:
Description :
        Company employee Tokiwa lives with his cousin Asagi. The two of them were living their normal, comfortable lives until one day, intoxicated with liquor on the night of Tokiwa's birthday, they began to reveal their deepest secrets..."The truth is, I remember my past lives.""The truth is, I'm a time traveler." A science-fantasy tale in which the fates of a reincarnation and a time traveler are intertwined!
